originalText.text: I had a great experience today with Lena as my artist. I appreciated the consultation over the phone before my appointment to narrow down the tattoo designs and estimate. The tattoo was amazing and exactly how I pictured it plus more!

text.text: I had a great experience today with Lena as my artist. I appreciated the consultation over the phone before my appointment to narrow down the tattoo designs and estimate. The tattoo was amazing and exactly how I pictured it plus more!

originalText.text: Even before I entered the studio, I felt welcomed, heard, and comfortable. I knew I was making a sound decision by coming to Yant Studio from the very first email. This was my second tattoo (first one done in the US) and my experience was exceptionally positive. Melanie was my tattoo artist and we discussed a couple of times over Zoom about my design idea. She was caring, honest and detail oriented. Melanie was patient with me during the appointment and was genuinely easy going and we had great conversation. Considering she was an apprentice at the time of my tattoo session, she was professional and thoughtful. The other tattoo artists there made me feel welcomed too, offering me ice cream during a water break. This kind of experience I feel is so rare in tattoo studios and in a heartbeat, I would return just to be around such sweet and embracing folks. Thank you again, Melanie and to the studio!

originalText.text: I got a piece done here by Rachel in July and I would highly recommend both this artist and this studio to anyone looking into tattoos! She was very helpful from the beginning in making sure that the design had everything that I wanted while also giving her own professional input on what would allow the design to be the best it can be. It was a great experience from beginning to end and I definitely plan on returning to Yant Studio for future pieces!

originalText.text: I had such a great experience at this tattoo studio! It is super clean and welcoming! Chu and Won do AMAZING work! They are the best! :) I am so happy with my tattoos! Thank you both so much!!!

text.text: I had such a great experience at this tattoo studio! It is super clean and welcoming! Chu and Won do AMAZING work! They are the best! :) I am so happy with my tattoos! Thank you both so much!!!

originalText.text:
Had an amazing 3hr session on the back of my arm with Melanie of Yant studio! Staff was super friendly and kept me informed about my appointment as time came closer to my tat date. I love the space -SUPER clean and fresh. The skyline is amazing. The lighting was bright. Everyone with Covid PPE as to keep us all safe.

Appreciated the conversations all around me And especially my own with artist Melanie. Can‚Äôt wait to go back for another tattoo üå∏üíó
